steps.title: Choose Your Jeep
steps.description: Select from a variety of jeeps, each with unique handling and performance characteristics.

steps.title: Master the Controls
steps.description: Learn the intuitive controls for acceleration, braking, and steering to navigate challenging terrain.

steps.title: Plan Your Route
steps.description: Study the trail map and choose your path through the mountains, considering difficulty and rewards.

steps.title: Upgrade Your Vehicle
steps.description: Earn points by completing challenges and use them to upgrade your jeep's performance and durability.
